column1: 2025-07-27 12:58:04|trace_0c3531e807f44ca882a4ea333263b2cb|Why Langgraph is the best choice for production comapred to CrewAI|Agent(name='Search agent'
column2: instructions="You are a research assistant. Given a search term
column3: you search the web for that term and produce a concise summary of the results. The summary must 2-3 paragraphs and less than 300 words. Capture the main points. Write succintly
column4: no need to have complete sentences or good grammar. This will be consumed by someone synthesizing a report
column5: so it's vital you capture the essence and ignore any fluff. Do not include any additional commentary other than the summary itself."
